Talking about Judge at LRUG

28 February 2012
  • judge
  • ruby
  • talk
  • video

In January, I gave a talk at the London Ruby User Group about Judge. I swore a bit and rambled a bit, as I often do. I've put the presentation slides up here and the talk is available to watch again courtesy of Skills Matter, the venue provider for LRUG.
